name: Zawy
cooked: Here’s Grok’s excellent evaluation of my selfish fix. Included is a simulation Grok did for me that shows an attacker with 40% of the hashrate will have a 16% loss 1% gain instead of a 15% gain.
topic_title: Selfish mining fix with a simulation
topic_html_title: Selfish mining fix with a simulation
raw: [Here's Grok's excellent evaluation of my selfish fix.](https://github.com/zawy12/difficulty-algorithms/issues/87)  Included is a simulation Grok did for me that shows an attacker with 40% of the hashrate will have a <strike>16% loss</strike> 1% gain instead of a 15% gain.
excerpt: Here’s Grok’s excellent evaluation of my selfish fix. Included is a simulation Grok did for me that shows an attacker with 40% of the hashrate will have a 16% loss 1% gain instead of a 15% gain.
